name: Jetpack Kiwi
description:
The aliens arrived and they are not friendly at all.

The last hope for the mankind is a Kiwi

He, with the help of his jetpack, is the only one who can counteract the aliens and their army with devastating weapons.



Fly your way through 20 levels, divided in 5 different areas



Unlock new skins and use up to 12 different Special Attacks



Collect powerups and become invincible

Play with a friend, and beat the game together!



What are you waiting for? The world needs your help!

Let the battle begin!
